CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Assignment_Name_Override__c)),Assignment_Name_Override__c, IF(pse__Is_Billable__c = FALSE, pse__Project__r.Name+" "+"Non-bill"+"-"+TEXT(pse__Role__c), IF(AND(pse__Is_Billable__c = TRUE, WAR__c = TRUE), pse__Project__r.Name + " "+"WAR"+"-"+TEXT(pse__Role__c), pse__Project__r.Name+"-"+TEXT(pse__Role__c))))
CustomField.label: Resource Planner Name
